data.title: Manisha Koirala
data.text:
Manisha KoiralaRayuwaHaihuwa Kathmandu, 16 ga Augusta, 1970 (53 shekaru)ƙasa NepalƳan uwaMahaifi Prakash KoiralaAbokiyar zama Samrat Dahal (en) (2010 - 2012)Ahali Siddharth Koirala (en) Ƴan uwaKaratuMakaranta New York University (en) Harsuna Harshen Hindu

Malayalam

NepaliSana'aSana'a Jarumi, ɗan wasan kwaikwayo, mai tsara fim, public figure (en) da mai rawaEmployers Majalisar Ɗinkin DuniyaKyaututtukaImaniAddini Hinduism (en) IMDb nm0463539

Manisha Koirala 'yar wasan kwaikwayo ce 'yar Nepal wacce ta shahara da aikinta a fina-finan Hindi da Tamil . [1] Fim ɗin farko na Koirala ya kasance a cikin fim ɗin Nepali Pheri Bhetaula na shekara ta alif ɗari tara da tamanin da tara (989) years later, she made her Bollywoo Subhash Ghai's Saudagar, which was a commercial success.[2] Shekaru biyu 2 bayan haka, ta fara fitowa a 2 Bollywood a cikin Saudagar na Subhash Ghai, wanda ya kasance nasara ta kasuwanci. Duk da haka, ta bi wannan ta hanyar fitowa a cikin jerin fina-finai waɗanda ba su da kyau a ofishin akwatin, ciki har da First Love Letter (1991), Anmol (1993), da Dhanwan (1993). kin Koirala ya samu sauyi a lokacin da ta yi tauraro a matsayin 'yar gwagwarmayar 'yanci a cikin Vidhu Vinod Chopra 's 1942: A Love Story a cikin shekara ta alif ɗari tara da casa'in da huɗu (1994).>[3][4][5] Ayyukanta sun sami yabo sosai kuma ta sami lambar yabo ta Filmfare Award for Best Actress . A shekara mai zuwa, Koirala ya sami lambar yabo ta Filmfare Critics Award don Mafi kyawun Jaruma, da Kyautar Filmfare don Mafi kyawun Jaruma - Tamil saboda yin wasa da musulmi da ya auri Hindu a lokacin rikicin Bombay na daga shekara ta alif ɗari tara da casa'in da biyu 1992 – zuwa 1993 a cikin Mani Ratnam – wanda ya jagoranci Tamil drama Bombay na shekara ta alif ɗari tara da casa'in da biyar (1995) . [6] [7]

Domin wasa 'yar bebe da ma'aurata a cikin Sanjay Leela Bhansali 's Khamoshi: The Musical na shekara ta alif ɗari tara da casa'in da shida (1996), Koirala ya sami lambar yabo ta masu sukar Fina-Finan na biyu a jere don Mafi kyawun Jaruma. Ta bi wannan tare da manyan ayyuka a cikin Agni Sakshi na shekara ta alif ɗari tara da casa'in da shida (1996) da Gupt: The Hidden Truth na shekara ta alif ɗari tara da casa'in da bakwai (1997), waɗanda ke cikin fina-finan Indiya mafi girma a cikin shekarun su. Ta yi wasan ta'addanci da Shah Rukh Khan a cikin Dil Se..nashekara ta alif ɗari tara da casa'in da takwas (1998), Fim ɗin Indiya na farko da ya kai 10 mafi girma a cikin akwatin akwatin United Kingdom. Duk da haka, rawar da Koirala ya taka a fina-finan da suka yi rashin kyau a akwatin akwatin, irin su Dil Ke Jharokhe Mein (1997), da Achanak (1998), ya haifar da koma baya a harkar fim. <ref>name="myself" /> [8] Ta fara fitowa a talabijin a shekara ta 2000 a matsayin mai gabatar da shirye-shiryen wasan kwaikwayon Sawaal Dus Crore Ka tare da Anupam Kher . Rashin kimar wasan kwaikwayon ya sa an kori Kher da Koirala duka. Don rawar da ta taka a matsayin budurwar gangster a Kamfanin wasan kwaikwayo na laifi na Ram Gopal Varma na 2002, ta sami lambar yabo ta Filmfare Critics Award na uku don Mafi kyawun Jaruma. [lower-alpha 1] Koirala kuma ta fito a cikin fim din Ek Chhotisi Love Story mai cike da cece-kuce inda ta taka wata mata da wata matashiya ta leko a asirce. A shekara mai zuwa, hotonta na marubuciyar Bengali Sushmita Banerjee a cikin wasan kwaikwayo na tserewa daga Taliban ta ba ta lambar yabo ta Ƙungiyar 'Yan Jarida ta Fina-Fina ta Bengal don Mafi kyawun Jaruma (Hindi) .

Aikin Koirala ya ci gaba da raguwa a tsakiyar shekarun 2000, yayin da ta fito a fina-finan da ba su da yawa. A cikin 2004, ta fara fitowa a matsayin furodusa tare da fim ɗin Paisa Vasool, wanda ya yi rashin kyau a ofishin akwatin. A shekara mai zuwa, ta nuna Mughal gimbiya Jahan Ara a cikin wasan kwaikwayo na tarihi Taj Mahal: Labarin Soyayya na Har abada . A cikin 2008, Koirala ya yi tauraro a cikin Rituparno Ghosh 's Khela, inda ta buga mata a cikin aure mai wahala. Shekaru biyu bayan haka, ta bayyana a matsayin matar zina a cikin wasan kwaikwayo na Malayalam Elektra . A shekara mai zuwa, ta buga wani musulmin Kashmiri yana ƙoƙarin maido da abokantaka na ƙuruciya a cikin fim ɗin anthology na Onir Ni Am (2011). A cikin 2012, ta fito a cikin jerin ban tsoro na Ram Gopal Varma Bhoot Returns a matsayin mahaifiyar 'yar da aka mallaka. Daga baya a wannan shekarar, ta huta daga yin wasan kwaikwayo bayan an gano ta da ciwon daji na ovarian . Bayan watanni shida na jinya, Koirala ya murmure daga yanayin. Shekaru uku bayan haka, ta koma yin aiki tare da mai ba da shawara na tunani Chehere: A Modern Day Classic (2015).

Samfuri:Pending films key

↑ "The economics of moviemaking". Rediff.com. 24 October 2002. Archived from the original on 11 June 2016 .

↑ "Manisha Koirala, 1942: A Love Story". Rediff.com. Archived from the original on 4 March 2016 .

↑ Rajadhyaksha, Ashish; Willemen, Paul (10 July 2014). Encyclopedia of Indian Cinema. Routledge. p. 183. ISBN 978-1-135-94318-9. Archived from the original on 21 April 2017.

↑ "1942 – A Love Story". British Film Institute. Archived from the original on 17 August 2016 .
